item.title: Bad Theology Makes Bad Workers: Full Time w/ David Bahnsen [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Today, the guys are joined by David Bahnsen to discuss his newest book, 'Full Time' and the theology of hard work. 

 

For more from Bahnsen: https://www.bahnsen.com/ 

 
The Bahnsen Economics Course (Free!) https://pubtv.flfnetwork.com/tabs/the-pub/collections/2234

item.title: Holding the Military Accountable - Brad Miller & Davis Younts [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Holding the military accountable in the higher ranks, even after retirement? A Declaration of Military Accountability was signed, what happens now? The guys are joined by Brad Miller and Davis Younts to talk about it. 

 

For more Brad Miller 

https://lnk.bio/Brad_Miller 

 

More from R. Davis Younts 

https://yountslaw.com/

item.title: 20yr Military Vet Stood Against Tyranny - Now Running as Arizona Rep [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Nick Kupper joins CrossPolitic to discuss his journey from serving the US in the Military to having to fight against government overreach. He’s now running to serve as state representative in Arizona’s 25th legislative district.

 

Support Nick Kupper

https://www.kupper4arizona.com/ 

 

Backstage Show w/ Mick Kupper can be found here! 

https://pubtv.flfnetwork.com/tabs/none/videos/26876

item.title: College Makes You Suck at Working w/ Red Balloon & New Saint Andrews [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Dr. Ben Merkle (President of New Saint Andrews College) & Andrew Crapuchettes (CEO of RedBalloon Work) join CrossPolitic to shed light on the startling revelation that college degrees are making people less employable.

NSA Alumni Database https://www.redballoon.work/nsa
